overview: Nidia Fevry, the Queen of Networking, is the CEO & Founder of Fevry Enterprises, a word of mouth and targetted marketing firm. Nidia Fevry works with entrepreneurs of the Gen-Y generation who are dedicated to positive and socially concious deeds and gets the word out about their ventures. In business, she and her partners aim to be ethical and do well both for themselves and the community. She took an interdisciplinary courseload in the Boston College Honors program, specializing in English, Philosophy and Communication. At the age of eight, Nidia emigrated from Haiti to the US. At the age of sixteen, she became a notable leader in High School, and now at the age of twenty-two, she is just beginning to see what possibilities lay ahead. Colleagues recognize her greatest attributes to be her enthusiasm, diligence, and love of people. She loves traveling and has lived in Haiti Mexico, Madrid, Boston, Los Angeles, all the while amassing a breadth of contacts through her associations and experiences. She is known to be an avid networker, constantly promoting, enhancing, and developing talent.
